attributes.additional_details:
I find that the schooling system is ripping away students' free time.

They first have to go through 6 hours of hard, disciplined working, and then bring that working home with them to forcibly do in their free time.

This is forced overtime as they already dedicate a quarter of their day PLUS the trip  to and from school and then have to do so for about another hour and a half.

If school is not a place to rest then home isn't a place to work. Sincerely, MT - a concerned student.
attributes.background: Make homework optional in government run schools.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban schools from being able to set homework: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622990

Ban schools from setting more than four hours of homework a week: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618953

Ban more than 1 hour of homework every week: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625160
